alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 11 at 1:58PM MST until January 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph creating areas of blowing snow reducing visibility under a half mile.. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...South Laramie Range, South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM to 11 PM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Friday to 6 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
